data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseArea
data.value: Gets or sets the area in which the field is displayed.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseAllowedAreas
data.value: Gets or sets the areas within which the field can be positioned.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalCollectionBaseItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to the elements in the collection.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalCollectionBaseField
data.value: Gets the field which owns the current collection.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalBaseTag
data.value: Gets or sets the data associated with the custom total.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalBaseSummaryType
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the summary function used to calculate the current custom total.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalBaseFormat
data.value: Provides the settings used to format the text within the custom total's headers.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalBaseCellFormat
data.value: Provides the settings used to format the custom total's values.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataSourceRowCount
data.value: Gets the number of records in the data source.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataSourceItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to the rows in the current data source.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataRowListSourceRowIndex
data.value: Gets the row's index in the pivot grid's data source.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataRowItem
data.value: Returns the value of the specified field in the current row.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataRowIndex
data.value: Gets the row's index within PivotDrillDownDataRow.DataSource.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataRowDataSource
data.value: Gets the data source which contains the current row.

data.name: PivotDataSourceRowCount
data.value: When overridden in descendant classes, gets the number of rows in the data source.

data.name: PivotDataSourceIsLive
data.value: When overridden in descendant classes, gets or sets whether to update the data source when the pivot grid data changes.

data.name: PivotCustomFieldValueCellsEventArgsBaseRowCount
data.value: Gets the number of rows in the pivot grid.

data.name: PivotCustomFieldValueCellsEventArgsBaseIsUpdateRequired
data.value: Gets whether the area where the field value cells reside needs to be redrawn after the event is handled.

data.name: PivotCustomFieldValueCellsEventArgsBaseColumnCount
data.value: Gets the number of columns in the pivot grid.

data.name: FieldValueSplitDataValue
data.value: Gets or sets the value of the new cell.

data.name: FieldValueSplitDataNestedCellCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of cells nested in the new cell.

data.name: FieldValueCellBaseValueType
data.value: Gets the type of the cell.

data.name: FieldValueCellBaseValue
data.value: Gets the field value represented by the cell.

data.name: FieldValueCellBaseStartLevel
data.value: Gets the first column or row level occupied by the cell.

data.name: FieldValueCellBaseMinIndex
data.value: Gets the index of the first nested cell at the last column/row level.

data.name: FieldValueCellBaseMaxIndex
data.value: Gets the index of the last nested cell at the last column/row level.

data.name: FieldValueCellBaseIsVisible
data.value: Gets whether the cell is visible.

data.name: FieldValueCellBaseIsColumn
data.value: Gets whether the cell is a column header.

data.name: FieldValueCellBaseIsCollapsed
data.value: Gets whether the field value is collapsed.

data.name: FieldValueCellBaseEndLevel
data.value: Gets the index of the last column or row level occupied by the cell.

data.name: FieldValueCellBaseDisplayText
data.value: Gets the text displayed within the cell.

data.name: FieldValueCellBaseCanExpand
data.value: Gets whether an end-user can expand/collapse the field value.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseColumnValueLineCount
data.value: If the current field is displayed in the Column Header Area, this property gets or sets the height of the field's values, in text lines.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseCellFormat
data.value: Provides access to the formatting settings applied to cells.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the field's display caption.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseCalculations
data.value: Reserved for future use.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseAutoPopulatedProperties
data.value: Get or set a collection of OLAP member properties.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseAreaIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the field's index from among the other fields displayed within the same area.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseDataType
data.value: Gets the field's data type.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseDefaultDateFormat
data.value: Provides access to global formatting settings for date/time values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseDefaultDecimalFormat
data.value: Provides access to global formatting settings for decimal values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseDefaultPercentFormat
data.value: Provides access to global formatting settings for percent values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseDefaultTotalFormat
data.value: Provides access to global format settings for total values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseEmptyCellText
data.value: Gets the text displayed by an empty cell.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseEmptyValueText
data.value: Gets the text used for an empty field value header.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseExpandedInFieldsGroup
data.value: Gets or sets the expansion status of the current field if it belongs to a field group.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the database field that is assigned to the current PivotGridFieldBase object.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseGrandTotalCellFormat
data.value: Provides access to the formatting settings applied to grand total values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseGrandTotalText
data.value: Gets or sets the text displayed within the Grand Total's header that corresponds to the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseGroupInterval
data.value: Gets or sets how the values of the current column or row field are combined into groups.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseGroupIntervalNumericRange
data.value: Gets or sets the length of the intervals when values are grouped together.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseHasNullValues
data.value: Gets whether the field has null values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseIsUnboundExpression
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether there is an unbound expression specified for the pivot grid field via thePivotGridFieldBase.UnboundExpression property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseIsUnboundExpressionValid
data.value: Gets whether the PivotGridFieldBase.UnboundExpression property's value specifies a valid expression.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseKPIGraphic
data.value: Gets or sets a graphic set used to indicate KPI values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseKPIType
data.value: Gets the KPI type.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseMinWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of columns that correspond to the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseOLAPDrillDownColumnName
data.value: In OLAP mode, gets the name of the corresponding column in the underlying data source, on an OLAP server.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseOptions
data.value: Contains the field's options.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBasePrefilterColumnName
data.value: Gets the name by which the field is referred to in the Prefilter expression.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseRowValueLineCount
data.value: If the current field is displayed in the Row Header Area, this property gets or sets the height of the field's values, in text lines.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseRunningTotal
data.value: Gets or sets whether Running totals are calculated for values in the Data Area that correspond to the current column or row field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseShowNewValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether field values that have appeared in the datasource after the field's filtering was configured should be shown.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseSortByAttribute
data.value: Gets or sets the OLAP member property name by which the pivot grid's data is sorted.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseSortBySummaryInfo
data.value: Contains the settings used to sort the values of the current column field or row field by summary values in rows/columns.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseSortMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the field's data is sorted when sorting is applied to it.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseSortOrder
data.value: Gets or sets the field's sort order.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseSummaryDisplayType
data.value: Gets or sets how a summary value calculated against the current data field is represented in a cell.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseSummaryType
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the summary function which is calculated against the current data field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseTag
data.value: Gets or sets the data associated with the field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseTopValueCount
data.value: Gets or sets the absolute or relative number of field values that should be displayed for the current column field or row field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseTopValueMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether top n values for a specified data field are calculated based on all data source records or in the parent category.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseTopValueShowOthers
data.value: Gets or sets whether the \"Others\" item is displayed within PivotGridControl when the Top X Value feature is enabled.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseTopValueType
data.value: Gets or sets how the number of Top Values is determined.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseTotalCellFormat
data.value: Provides access to the formatting settings applied to total cells.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseTotalsVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets whether totals are displayed for the current field when it is positioned within the Column Header Area or Row Header Area and if so, whether they are automatic or custom.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseTotalValueFormat
data.value: Provides access to the formatting settings applied to the total header.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseUnboundExpression
data.value: Gets or sets an expression used to evaluate values for the current unbound field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseUnboundExpressionMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether unbound expression for specified data field is calculated based on the data source records or summary values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseUnboundFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of a column in a summary data source that corresponds to the current unbound field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseUnboundType
data.value: Gets or sets the data type and binding mode of the field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseUseNativeFormat
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the current field's data format when the Pivot Grid Control is exported in XLS format.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseValueFormat
data.value: Provides access to the formatting settings applied to field values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the field is visible.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBaseWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of columns that correspond to the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldCollectionBaseDefaultFieldWidth
data.value: Gets the default width of Field Value boxes.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFilterValuesCount
data.value: Gets the number of elements in the PivotGridFieldFilterValues.Values array.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFilterValuesField
data.value: Gets the field which owns the current collection.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFilterValuesFilterType
data.value: Gets or sets the field's filter type.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFilterValuesHasFilter
data.value: Gets whether the current PivotGridFieldFilterValues object specifies non-empty filter criteria.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFilterValuesIsEmpty
data.value: Gets whether the current collection contains values used to filter against the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFilterValuesShowBlanks
data.value: Gets or sets whether records that contain NULL values in the current field should be processed by the control.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFilterValuesValues
data.value: Gets or sets an array of filter values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFilterValuesValuesExcluded
data.value: Gets or sets which values are excluded from the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFilterValuesValuesIncluded
data.value: Gets or sets the values that are displayed in the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsAllowDrag
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to drag the Field Header.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsAllowDragInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to drag field headers between areas in the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsAllowExpand
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to expand/collapse the rows or columns which correspond to the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsAllowFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can apply a filter to the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsAllowFilterBySummary
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to filter pivot grid data by summaries calculated against the current data field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsAllowRunTimeSummaryChange
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can change the data field's summary type.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsAllowSort
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can modify the field's current sort order.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsAllowSortBySummary
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can sort the current row/column field values by other column/row summary values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsGroupFilterMode
data.value: Gets or sets the filtering mode used for the field's owner group.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsHideEmptyVariationItems
data.value: Gets or sets whether the first (empty) column/row that displays variation data for the current data field must be hidden.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsOLAPFilterByUniqueName
data.value: Gets or sets whether PivotGridControl should take into account OLAP member values or unique names when filtering data in an OLAP mode.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsOLAPFilterUsingWhereClause
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the WHERE or subselect clause in an MDX query, when filtering against filter fields in OLAP mode.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsOLAPUseNonEmpty
data.value: Gets or sets whether the <a href=\"http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms145988.aspx\">NonEmpty function should be used in MDX queries for the current measure.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsShowCustomTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether Custom Totals that correspond to the current Column Field or Row Field are visible.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsShowGrandTotal
data.value: Gets or sets whether grand totals that correspond to the current data field are visible.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsShowInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether the field's header is displayed within the customization form when the field is hidden.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsShowInPrefilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the field is shown in Prefilter.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsShowSummaryTypeName
data.value: Gets or sets whether the summary type is displayed within the data field's header.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsShowTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether Totals that correspond to the current data field are visible.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOptionsShowValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether data cells that correspond to the current data field are visible.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryInfoConditions
data.value: Contains conditions that identify the column or row whose values are sorted.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryInfoCustomTotalSummaryType
data.value: Gets or sets the summary type of the custom total column/row, by which the current field values are sorted.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryInfoField
data.value: Gets or sets the field whose summary values define the order in which the values of the current column field or row field are arranged.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryInfoFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the field name of the field whose summary values define the order in which the values of the current column field or row field are arranged.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryInfoIsEmpty
data.value: Gets whether the current object is initialized with valid data.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryInfoSummaryType
data.value: Gets or sets the summary function type used to calculate the summary values which define the order in which the current column field's (row field's) values are arranged.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortConditionField
data.value: Gets or sets the field to which the condition corresponds.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortConditionOLAPUniqueMemberName
data.value: Gets or sets the unique name of the corresponding OLAP member.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortConditionValue
data.value: Gets or sets the field value represented by the condition.

data.name: PivotGridFilterItemIsBlank
data.value: Gets whether the filter item represents the blank field value.

data.name: PivotGridFilterItemIsChecked
data.value: Gets or sets the check state of the filter item.

data.name: PivotGridFilterItemLevel
data.value: Gets the hierarchy level of the filter item when overridden in descendant classes.

data.name: PivotGridFilterItemsFilterValues
data.value: For internal use.

data.name: PivotGridFilterItemsGroup
data.value: For internal use.

data.name: PivotGridFilterItemsPersistentString
data.value: For internal use.

data.name: PivotGridFilterItemValue
data.value: Gets or sets the field value represented by the filter item.

data.name: PivotGridGroupCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the group's caption.

data.name: PivotGridGroupCollectionItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to the groups in the collection.

data.name: PivotGridGroupCount
data.value: Gets the number of fields within the group.

data.name: PivotGridGroupFilterValues
data.value: Gets the group filter condition.

data.name: PivotGridGroupItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to the fields in the group.

data.name: PivotGridGroupVisibleCount
data.value: Gets the number of visible fields within the current group.

data.name: PivotGridLocalizerActive
data.value: Gets or sets a localizer object providing localization of the PivotGrid's user interface at runtime.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsBehaviorBaseBestFitMode
data.value: Gets or sets which visual elements are taken into account when calculating the optimal width for columns.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsBehaviorBaseClipboardCopyCollapsedValuesMode
data.value: Gets or sets how to copy collapsed field values to the clipboard.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsBehaviorBaseClipboardCopyMultiSelectionMode
data.value: Gets or sets how to copy cells to the clipboard when multiple cells are selected.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsBehaviorBaseCopyToClipboardWithFieldValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether field values are copied to the clipboard when CTRL+C is pressed or the CopySelectionToClipboard method is called.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsBehaviorBaseLoadingPanelDelay
data.value: Gets or sets the delay between starting an asynchronous operation and displaying the loading panel.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsBehaviorBaseSortBySummaryDefaultOrder
data.value: Gets or sets the sort order applied to a field when sorting by summaries is enabled for it.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsBehaviorBaseUseAsyncMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether data-aware operations caused by end-user actions are performed asynchronously.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseAutoTransposeChart
data.value: Gets or sets whether a bound chart control should be transposed if the number of series exceeds the number of argument values.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseDataProvideMode
data.value: Gets or sets what data the pivot grid should pass to a bound chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseDataProvidePriority
data.value: Gets or sets whether the pivot grid should pass columns or rows to a bound chart control when it is impossible to find the lowest-level data.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseFieldValuesProvideMode
data.value: Gets or sets how field values are passed to the chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseMaxAllowedPointCountInSeries
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of points allowed in a series.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseMaxAllowedSeriesCount
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of series allowed in the chart data source.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideCellValuesAsType
data.value: Gets or sets the type to which cell values are converted, before they are exported to the Chart Control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideColumnCustomTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether column custom totals should be passed to a chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideColumnFieldValuesAsType
data.value: Gets or sets the type to which the column field values are converted before they are exported to the chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideColumnGrandTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether column grand totals are passed to a chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideColumnTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether column totals are passed to a chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideDataByColumns
data.value: Gets or sets whether series in a chart control are created for PivotGrid columns or rows.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideDataFieldsOnSeries
data.value: For internal use.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideEmptyCells
data.value: Gets or sets whether empty cells should be processed by the Chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideRowCustomTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether row custom totals should be displayed in a chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideRowFieldValuesAsType
data.value: Gets or sets the type to which the row field values are converted, before they are exported to the chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideRowGrandTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether row grand totals are passed to a chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceBaseProvideRowTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether row totals are passed to a chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceSelectionOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether a chart control must display selected cells or all the data of the PivotGrid control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsChartDataSourceUpdateDelay
data.value: Gets or sets the delay between changing the cell focus or selection, and updating the bound Chart control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to invoke the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowDrag
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to drag field headers.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowDragInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to drag field headers between areas in the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowExpand
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to expand/collapse rows or columns that correspond to the current field.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowExpandOnDoubleClick
data.value: Gets or sets whether field values are expanded/collapsed on a double click.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether filter buttons are displayed within field headers.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowFilterBySummary
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to filter pivot grid data by summaries.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowFilterInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether filtering can be applied to fields via the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowHideFields
data.value: Gets or sets a value which specifies when the fields can be hidden by end-users.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowPrefilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to invoke the Prefilter.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowSort
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can change the sort order of fields.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowSortBySummary
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can sort row field values by column values, and column field values by row values.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationAllowSortInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether the sort order of field values can be toggled via the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationCustomizationFormAllowedLayouts
data.value: Gets or sets which layouts can be applied to the Customization Form when it is painted in Excel2007 style.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationCustomizationFormLayout
data.value: Gets or sets the customization form's layout when it is painted in Excel2007 style.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationCustomizationFormStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the Customization Form's style.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsCustomizationDeferredUpdates
data.value: Gets or sets whether dragging fields within the Customization Form (when it's painted using the Excel2007 style) immediately updates the layout of fields in the PivotGrid control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataAllowCrossGroupVariation
data.value: Gets or sets whether summary variations and running totals are calculated independently within individual groups, or throughout the Pivot Grid.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataAutoExpandGroups
data.value: Gets or sets whether field values are expanded or collapsed by default.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataCaseSensitive
data.value: Gets or sets whether data is grouped case-sensitively.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataDataFieldUnboundExpressionMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether unbound expressions for pivot grid's data fields are calculated based on the data source records or summary values.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataDrillDownMaxRowCount
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of rows returned when calling the CreateDrillDownDataSource method.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataFieldArea
data.value: Gets or sets the area in which the data field headers are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataFieldAreaIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the data field headers.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataFieldCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the text displayed within the data header.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataFieldColumnValueLineCount
data.value: Gets or sets the height of data field headers, in text lines. This property is in effect when there are two or more data fields, and data field headers are displayed in the Column Header Area.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataFieldFieldNaming
data.value: Gets or sets the rule for naming columns, that correspond to data fields, when creating a data source via the CreateSummaryDataSource methods.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataFieldRowHeaderWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of the data field headers when they are displayed as row headers.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataFieldRowValueLineCount
data.value: Gets or sets the height of data field headers, in text lines. This property is in effect when there are two or more data fields, and data field headers are displayed in the Row Header Area.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsDataFilterByVisibleFieldsOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether to take into account filter conditions of visible filter fields only.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsFilterBaseGroupFilterMode
data.value: Gets or sets the filtering mode used for field groups.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsOLAPFilterByUniqueName
data.value: Gets or sets whether PivotGridControl should take into account OLAP member values or unique names when filtering data in the OLAP mode.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsOLAPSortByCustomFieldValueDisplayText
data.value: In OLAP, allows you to sort data using the PivotGridControl.FieldValueDisplayText event.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsOLAPUseAggregateForSingleFilterValue
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the Aggregate function in the MDX query, if the filter contains a single value.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintColumnFieldValueSeparator
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between the values of column fields when the pivot grid is printed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintFilterSeparatorBarPadding
data.value: Gets or sets the vertical distance between filter field headers headers and the main part of the printed pivot grid.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintMergeColumnFieldValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether the values of outer column fields are merged when a pivot grid is printed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintMergeRowFieldValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether the values of outer row fields are merged when a pivot grid is printed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintPageSettings
data.value: Provides access to the page settings to print the PivotGrid control.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintPrintColumnHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether column field headers are printed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintPrintDataHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether data field headers are printed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintPrintFilterHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether filter field headers are printed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintPrintHeadersOnEveryPage
data.value: Gets or sets whether to print column headers on every page.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintPrintHorzLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether horizontal grid lines are printed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintPrintRowHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether row field headers are printed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintPrintUnusedFilterFields
data.value: Gets or sets whether unused filter fields are printed/exported.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintPrintVertLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether vertical grid lines are printed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintRowFieldValueSeparator
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between row field values when the pivot grid is printed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintUsePrintAppearance
data.value: Gets or sets whether print appearances are used when the pivot grid is printed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsPrintVerticalContentSplitting
data.value: Gets or sets whether a cell is allowed to be split across pages.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsSelectionCellSelection
data.value: Gets or sets whether multiple cells can be selected.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsSelectionEnableAppearanceFocusedCell
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings used to paint the focused cell are enabled.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsSelectionMaxHeight
data.value: Gets the maximum number of rows that can be selected simultaneously.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsSelectionMaxWidth
data.value: Gets the maximum number of columns that can be selected simultaneously.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsSelectionMultiSelect
data.value: Gets or sets whether multiple range selection is enabled.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseColumnTotalsLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the location of the column totals.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseDrawFocusedCellRect
data.value: Gets or sets whether a focus rectangle is painted around the currently focused cell.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseHeaderHeightOffset
data.value: Gets or sets the distance (vertical) between field headers.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseHeaderWidthOffset
data.value: Gets or sets the distance (horizontal) between field headers.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseRowTotalsLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the location of the totals and grand totals.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseRowTreeOffset
data.value: Gets or sets the tree offset.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseRowTreeWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of the innermost row field values.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowColumnGrandTotalHeader
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Grand Total column header is visible when there are two or more data fields.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowColumnGrandTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether column Grand Totals are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowColumnHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether column headers are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowColumnTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether column automatic Totals are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowCustomTotalsForSingleValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether custom totals are displayed for the field values which contain a single nesting field value.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowDataHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether data headers are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowFilterHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether filter headers are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowFilterSeparatorBar
data.value: Gets or sets whether the horizontal line that separates the Filter Header Area from the Data Area and Column Header Area is displayed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowGrandTotalsForSingleValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether grand totals are displayed when the control lists a single value of an outer column field or row field along its left or top edge.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowHorzLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether horizontal grid lines are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowRowGrandTotalHeader
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Grand Total row header is visible when there are two or more data fields.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowRowGrandTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether row Grand Totals are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowRowHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether row headers are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowRowTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether row automatic Totals are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowTotalsForSingleValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether automatic totals are displayed for the field values which contain a single nesting field value.

data.name: PivotGridOptionsViewBaseShowVertLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether vertical grid lines are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridPageSettingsLandscape
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page orientation is landscape.

data.name: PivotGridPageSettingsMargins
data.value: Gets or sets the margins of a print page.

data.name: PivotGridPageSettingsPaperHeight
data.value: Gets or sets a custom height of the paper, in hundredths of an inch. The property is in effect when the PivotGridPageSettings.PaperKind property is set to Custom.

data.name: PivotGridPageSettingsPaperKind
data.value: Gets or sets the type of paper for the document.

data.name: PivotGridPageSettingsPaperWidth
data.value: Gets or sets a custom width of the paper, in hundredths of an inch. The property is in effect when the PivotGridPageSettings.PaperKind property is set to Custom.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValueChildValues
data.value: Gets the collection of the filter value's child values.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValueField
data.value: Gets the field to which the filter value corresponds.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValueIsLastLevel
data.value: Gets whether the field to which the filter value corresponds is the last in the group.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValueLevel
data.value: Gets the hierarchy level of the field to which the filter value corresponds.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValuesCollectionCount
data.value: Gets the number of filter values in the collection.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValuesCollectionIsEmpty
data.value: Gets whether the collection is empty.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValuesCount
data.value: Gets the number of filter values.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValuesFilterType
data.value: Gets or sets the filter type.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValuesGroup
data.value: Gets the owner field group.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValuesHasFilter
data.value: Gets whether the filter condition is not empty.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValuesIsEmpty
data.value: Gets whether the filter condition is empty.

data.name: PivotGroupFilterValuesValues
data.value: Gets the collection of filter values.

data.name: PivotOLAPKPIMeasuresGoalMeasure
data.value: Gets the name of the measure that stores the KPI's goal values.

data.name: PivotOLAPKPIMeasuresKPIName
data.value: Gets the name of the KPI.

data.name: PivotOLAPKPIMeasuresStatusMeasure
data.value: Gets the name of the measure that stores the KPI's status values.

data.name: PivotOLAPKPIMeasuresTrendMeasure
data.value: Gets the name of the measure that stores the KPI's trend values.

data.name: PivotOLAPKPIMeasuresValueMeasure
data.value: Gets the name of the measure that stores the KPI's actually achieved values.

data.name: PivotOLAPKPIMeasuresWeightMeasure
data.value: Gets the name of the measure that stores the KPI's weight values.

data.name: PivotOLAPKPIValueGoal
data.value: Gets the KPI's goal value.

data.name: PivotOLAPKPIValueStatus
data.value: Gets the KPI's status value.

data.name: PivotOLAPKPIValueTrend
data.value: Gets the KPI's trend value.

data.name: PivotOLAPKPIValueValue
data.value: Gets the KPI's actually achieved value.

data.name: PivotOLAPKPIValueWeight
data.value: Gets the KPI's weight value.

data.name: PivotSummaryDataRowColumnIndex
data.value: Gets the index of the pivot grid column where the cell represented by the summary row resides.

data.name: PivotSummaryDataRowDataSource
data.value: Gets the parent summary data source.

data.name: PivotSummaryDataRowIndex
data.value: Gets the index of the current row in the summary data source.

data.name: PivotSummaryDataRowItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to the cells in the current row.

data.name: PivotSummaryDataRowLocation
data.value: Gets the location of the pivot grid cell represented by the current summary row.

data.name: PivotSummaryDataRowRowIndex
data.value: Gets the index of the pivot grid row where the cell represented by the summary row resides.

data.name: PivotSummaryDataSourceIsLive
data.value: Gets or sets whether to update the data source when the pivot grid data changes.

data.name: PivotSummaryDataSourceRowCount
data.value: Gets the number of rows in the data source.

data.name: PivotSummaryFilterColumnField
data.value: Gets or sets a column field used to identify an aggregation level to which the filtering is applied.

data.name: PivotSummaryFilterRowField
data.value: Gets or sets the row field used to identify an aggregation level to which the filtering is applied.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueAverage
data.value: Returns the value of the PivotSummaryType.Average function for the current cell.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueCount
data.value: Returns the value of the PivotSummaryType.Count function for the current cell.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueCustomValue
data.value: Gets or sets a custom summary value for the current cell.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueErrorValue
data.value: Returns a unique object that identifies an error.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueMax
data.value: Returns the value of the PivotSummaryType.Max function for the current cell.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueMin
data.value: Returns the value of the PivotSummaryType.Min function for the current cell.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueStdDev
data.value: Returns the value of the PivotSummaryType.StdDev function for the current cell.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueStdDevp
data.value: Returns the value of the PivotSummaryType.StdDevp function for the current cell.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueSummary
data.value: Returns the value of the PivotSummaryType.Sum function for the current cell.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueTag
data.value: Gets or sets custom data for the current PivotSummaryValue object.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueVar
data.value: Returns the value of the PivotSummaryType.Var function for the current cell.

data.name: PivotSummaryValueVarp
data.value: Returns the value of the PivotSummaryType.Varp function for the current cell.

data.name: PrefilterBaseCriteria
data.value: Gets or sets the filter expression.

data.name: PrefilterBaseCriteriaString
data.value: Gets or sets the filter expression, in the string form.

data.name: PrefilterBaseEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether the filter criteria, specified by the PrefilterBase.Criteria or PrefilterBase.CriteriaString property, are enabled.

data.name: PrefilterBaseIsEmpty
data.value: Gets whether the Prefilter has no filter expression specified.

data.name: PrefilterBaseState
data.value: Gets the Prefilter state that indicates whether the Prefilter expression is valid.

data.name: PrintAppearanceCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to print data cells.

data.name: PrintAppearanceCustomTotalCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to print custom total cells.

data.name: PrintAppearanceFieldHeader
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to print field headers.

data.name: PrintAppearanceFieldValue
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to print the values of fields and the default appearance settings used to print grand totals and totals.

data.name: PrintAppearanceFieldValueGrandTotal
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to print grand total headers.

data.name: PrintAppearanceFieldValueTotal
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to print the headers of totals.

data.name: PrintAppearanceGrandTotalCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to print grand total cells.

data.name: PrintAppearanceLines
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to print the horizontal and vertical lines.

data.name: PrintAppearanceObjectBackColor
data.value: Specifies the background color.

data.name: PrintAppearanceObjectBorderColor
data.value: Specifies the border color.

data.name: PrintAppearanceObjectBorderWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the border width.

data.name: PrintAppearanceObjectDefaultFont
data.value: Gets the default font of the appearance object.

data.name: PrintAppearanceObjectFont
data.value: Specifies the font used to render the text.

data.name: PrintAppearanceObjectForeColor
data.value: Specifies the foreground color.

data.name: PrintAppearanceTotalCell
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to print automatic total cells.

data.name: PrintTextOptionsHAlignment
data.value: Specifies the horizontal alignment of text.

data.name: ReadOnlyCellsCount
data.value: Gets the number of elements in the collection.

data.name: ReadOnlyCellsIsEmpty
data.value: Gets whether the collection is empty.

data.name: ReadOnlyCellsRectangle
data.value: Gets the rectangle that bounds the cells.
